main event: The witness has been seeing a strange light in the sky almost every morning for the past three months. The light travels slowly and steadily across the sky and is white in color.
interesting points: The light turns red, then white, then red again, and flashes to the right, upwards, and downwards.
The light sometimes appears much brighter and goes back to the same point as before.
The witness has observed the light's unusual pattern of movement, where it first goes up, then seems to blend with the sky, and sometimes moves slowly at first, then faster, and then slower again.
The witness observed the light on several specific dates, including February 18th, March 6th, and February 22nd.
The witness is very interested in these sightings and has offered to continue sending reports.
sighted object: a strange white light in the sky
